----About  bento lunch box-----
[ Does my husband heat the bento or eat it cold? ]
He eats the bento at room temperature. That is natural things for us. but I know many people (also Japanese) wanna heat it. so I recommend you to use the lunch box that is fine for microwave, if you wanna heat it ;)
